column2: These laws determine the legal status of prostitution.
Prostitution is legal and brothels are allowed to operate as long as they please.
Prostitution is illegal and all brothels put out of business. Anyone found operating a brothel will be heavily fined and potentially put to death
Only weak men lie with whores.

A high profile case has been the gossip of your court lately. Apparently, [brothel_crime.GetFirstName] has been caught visiting an underground brothel in clear violation of the law. [From.GetTitledNameWithNick] is presiding over the case, and it seems he wants to have [brothel_crime.GetFirstName] imprisoned.
Intervene and have him fined instead.
Though whoring is against the law, a small fine should suffice for such an infraction.
[From.GetFirstName] be damned, this isn't worth throwing a man in prison!

Your Grand Judge has summoned the court today to make an announcement. [From.GetTitledName] has decreed that the moral effects of prostitution outweigh the money it brings to the realm. [From.GetSheHeCap] speaks of a growing number of unaccounted for bastard children in the capital and rising crime due to moral decay as [From.GetHerHis] reason for this decision.
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s religion is one traditionally opposed to brothels
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s culture is one traditionally opposed to brothels
